The '''Overworld Update''' is the name of the update for released on February 18, 2016 for ''[[Pocket Edition]]'' and ''[[Windows 10 Edition]]'' as [[Pocket Edition v0.14.0 alpha|alpha version v0.14.0]].

The official name for the update, the ''Overworld Update'', was revealed on February 10, 2016 in a blog post on the Xbox website.<ref>https://news.xbox.com/en-us/2016/02/10/minecraft-overworld-update-coming/</ref>

__TOC__

== Notable features ==
{{main|Pocket Edition v0.14.0 alpha}}
; New [[block]]s
* [[File:Cauldron BE1.png|32px]] [[Cauldron]]
** Crafted using seven [[iron ingot]]s.
** Can be used to store water, even in the [[Nether]].
** The color of the water can be changed with a [[dye]].
*** Dyes can be mixed.
*** Using leather armor on a colored water dyes the armor.
** Can also be used to store potions.
*** If potions are mixed together, an explosion sound will be made and the potion disappears.
* [[File:Dispenser (S) JE2 BE1.png|32px]] [[Dispenser]]
** Crafted using seven [[cobblestone]]s, a [[redstone dust]], and a [[bow]].
** Used to dispense items, with some having certain properties.
** Does not show its name in the GUI.
* [[File:Dropper (S) JE1 BE1.png|32px]] [[Dropper]]
** Crafted using seven [[cobblestone]] and one [[redstone dust]].
** Will eject an item similar to a [[dispenser]], but will not do any special functions that a dispenser would normally do, such as shooting an [[arrow]].
** Will also transfer items to a container when faced to it.
** Does not show its name in the GUI.
* [[File:Hopper (D) JE8.png|32px]] [[Hopper]]
** Crafted using five [[iron ingot]]s and a [[chest]].
** Used to collect items and drop them to a corresponding container.
** Any container objects placed above the hopper will automatically have their items removed by the hopper.
** Does not show its name in the GUI.
* [[File:Redstone Comparator (S) JE4.png|32px]] [[Redstone Comparator]]
** Crafted using three [[redstone torch]]es, a [[nether quartz]], and three [[stone]].
** Reads inputs from any adjacent blocks and sends an output.
** Can also be used to compared redstone signals.
*** If signal A is stronger or equal to signal B, it repeats the signal or outputs the difference between singal A and B.
*** If signal A is weaker than signal B, no output is given.
* [[File:Redstone Repeater (S) JE3.png|32px]] [[Redstone Repeater]]
** Crafted using three [[stone]]s, two [[redstone torch]]es, and a [[redstone dust]].
** Repeats redstone signals back to full strength.'
** Can be locked by another powered redstone repeater.
* [[File:Slime Block BE1.png|32px]] [[Slime Block]]
** Crafted using nine [[slimeball]]s.
*** Can also be crafted back into nine slimeballs.
** Entities landing on the top spot of a slime block will bounce, negating fall damage.
** Adjacent blocks near a slime block will move with it when the slime block is moved with a [[piston]].
* New red sandstone blocks:
** [[File:Red Sandstone JE1 BE1.png|32px]] [[Red Sandstone]]
*** Found in [[mesa]] biomes.
*** Can also be crafted using four [[red sand]].
*** [[File:Red Sandstone Stairs (N) JE1 BE1.png|32px]] [[Red Sandstone Stairs]]
*** [[File:Red Sandstone Slab JE1 BE1.png|32px]] [[Red Sandstone Slab]]
** [[File:Cut Red Sandstone JE1 BE1.png|32px]] [[Cut Red Sandstone|Smooth Red Sandstone]]
** [[File:Chiseled Red Sandstone JE1 BE1.png|32px]] [[Chiseled Red Sandstone]]

; New [[item]]s
* [[File:Ender Pearl JE1.png|class=pixel-image|32px]] [[Ender Pearl]]
** Only available through modifications.
* {{Animate|Empty Map JE1 BE1.png; Map (item) JE1 BE1.png|32px}} [[Map]]
** Crafted using nine [[paper]].
** Used to create a visual of the world.
* [[Spawn egg]]:
** [[File:Witch Spawn Egg JE1 BE1.png|32px]] Witch Spawn Egg

; New [[mob]]s
* [[File:Witch BE Revision 2.png|32px]] [[Witch]]
** Spawns in [[witch hut]]s.
** Throws splash potions of Poison, Slowness, Weakness, and Instant Damage at the player.
** Will drink a potion of Instant Health and Fire Resistance to defend itself.
** Has 80% immunity against splash potion effects.
** Drops [[stick]]s, [[glowstone dust]], [[redstone dust]], [[gunpowder]], [[sugar]], [[spider eye]]s, or [[glass bottle]]s when killed.

; New non-mob entities
* [[File:Item Frame JE1 BE1.png|32px]] [[Item Frame]]
** Crafted using a piece of [[leather]] surrounded by [[stick]]s.
** Used to display any item or blocks.
* [[File:Minecart with Chest JE3 BE1.png|32px]] [[Minecart with Chest]]
** Crafted using a [[chest]] and a [[minecart]].
** Now spawns in [[mineshaft]]s.
** Used to store items that can be moved.
* [[File:Minecart with Hopper JE1 BE1.png|32px]] [[Minecart with Hopper]]
** Crafted using a [[hopper]] and a [[minecart]].
** Collects items from above when in motion.
* [[File:Minecart with TNT JE1 BE1.png|32px]] [[Minecart with TNT]]
** Crafted using a [[TNT]] and a [[minecart]].
** Activates when over a powered [[activator rail]].
** Can also explode when hitting a nearby block.

; New [[Generated structures|structures]]
* [[File:Swamp hut JE1 BE1.png|32px]] [[Witch hut]]
** Found in [[swamp]]s.
** A [[witch]] can be found around the vicinity.
** The [[cauldron]] contains a random potion.

; Other additions
* [[File:EnvSprite creative.png|class=pixel-image|32px]] [[Creative|Creative mode]]
** Players now has access to the survival inventory and crafting tab.
** Additionally armor can be put on.
** Inventory is kept when switching game modes.
** Various utility items can now interacted in Creative mode.

; Notable changes
* Various mobs, blocks, and items received changes.
* [[Baby zombie]]s now has a 15% chance of being a jockey, and can mount the following animals:
** [[Chicken]]s, [[ocelot]]s, [[wolf|wolves]], [[cow]]s, [[pig]]s, [[sheep]], [[spider]]s, and another [[zombie]].
* [[Village]]s now have increased door-to-villager ratios.
* [[Moss stone boulder]]s are rounder.

== Further revisions ==
* [[Pocket Edition v0.14.1 alpha|Alpha v0.14.1]] added the ''Minecraft: Story Mode'' skin pack.
* [[Pocket Edition v0.14.2 alpha|Alpha v0.14.2]] fixed some bugs and crashes from Alpha v0.14.1.
* [[Pocket Edition v0.14.3 alpha|Alpha v0.14.3]] added the Biome Settlers Pack 2 skin pack.
